31736.summary: Some customers in the Arbor Creek area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31736.title: Jan 10 – Saskatoon (Arbor Creek) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
